system.descriptor: Changing the Disposition/Opinion, or the act of convincing someone in an overtly friendly manner.  Target(s) must share common language and be able to see and hear user.
system.uses:
From Prior Editions: Includers Performer (X) Tests.
Uses: When used to change a person's mood, it is an Opposed Test vs Target's Willpower. Can be used to make someone like the character, distract someone, coax info from locals or strangers.
Can affect a number of people up to 10x Character's Fellowship Bonus
